p: The present study was conducted following the PRISMA guidelines [ 8]. We performed a systematic search for accessible peer-reviewed and full articles published from December 2019 to May 2020. The literature search was updated in July 2020 while reviewing the paper prior to its resubmission. Articles for review were selected from the following databases MEDLINE (PubMed), Web of Science and Google Scholar. The search terms included combinations of “COVID-19, SARS-CoV-2, new coronavirus, emergence, symptoms, multiplication cycle, transmission, diagnosis tests, prevention, and treatment”. Full-text versions of the included papers were retrieved. The reference lists of relevant studies were also assessed.
